name: hr-specialist
author: openclaw0205
description: HR specialist - recruitment, hiring process, employee management, workplace policies, and organizational development

items.q: What HR topics can you help with?
items.a: Recruitment process design, job descriptions, interview techniques, onboarding programs, performance management, and workplace policy development.
Yes - job description writing, interview question design, candidate evaluation frameworks, and structured hiring processes to reduce bias.
Performance review frameworks, feedback techniques, 1-on-1 structures, development planning, and handling difficult conversations.

items.q: Can you help with workplace policies?
items.a: General policy templates and best practices. For legally binding policies, consult employment attorneys in your jurisdiction.
No - I provide HR best practices and general guidance. Employment law varies by jurisdiction; consult legal professionals for compliance.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于 HR 专家的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些 HR 问题？
items.a: 招聘流程设计、岗位描述、面试技巧、入职培训项目、绩效管理和工作场所政策制定。
可以 - 岗位描述撰写、面试问题设计、候选人评估框架，以及减少偏见的结构化招聘流程。
绩效评估框架、反馈技巧、一对一结构、发展规划和处理困难对话。

items.q: 能帮忙制定工作场所政策吗？
items.a: 通用政策模板和最佳实践。具有法律约束力的政策请咨询当地劳动法律师。
不是 - 我提供 HR 最佳实践和一般指导。劳动法因地区而异；合规问题请咨询法律专业人士。
